nodes.text: A clone was stationed in the Republic Judiciary Central Detention Center in the Galactic City on Coruscant.

Around 21 BBY, when Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi disguised himself as bounty hunter Rako Hardeen and infiltrated the Republic Judiciary Central Detention Center to uncover a plot to assassinate Supreme Chancellor Palpatine, this clone was working in the detention facility's cremation center.

After the undercover Jedi along with prisoners Cad Bane and Moralo Eval started a prison riot in the mess hall, they managed to evade the prison guards and used the morgue to escape, hiding inside caskets which were sent to the cremation center. This clone along with three others were working in the cremation center when the incident happened, and started checking the caskets after a fellow clone detected life signs. When he opened the caskets, the prisoners inside jumped out and started attacking the other clones. One clone grabbed his DC-15S and tried to shoot Cad Bane, but he managed to grab this clone and used him as a shield, blocking the other one's shots.

The clone first appeared in the fifteenth episode of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series' fourth season, titled "Deception". He was voiced by Dee Bradley Baker, the actor who portrays all of the clone troopers in the series.
